comment_list.body: "Mibillenium" is an intentional pun, and "cryptocoin" is a completely valid synonym for "cryptocurrency".

> "Mibillenium" is an intentional pun, and "cryptocoin" is a completely valid synonym for "cryptocurrency".

fixed

> Thanks for fixing the typo, but ten commits and several reviewer interactions are a lot of effort for such a trivial improvement. Preferably only open a pull request if there is a more substantial improvement to be made.

Sorry, I'll take that into account next time
